name: dlpack
description:
DLPack is an RFC for common tensor and operator guidelines in deep
learning systems.

dependent_to.name: libcudf
dependent_to.description:
Built based on the Apache Arrow columnar memory format, cuDF is a GPU
DataFrame library for loading, joining, aggregating, filtering, and
otherwise manipulating data.

dependent_to.name: py-awkward1
dependent_to.description: DEPRECATED! This package was renamed to py-awkward.

dependent_to.name: py-awkward
dependent_to.description: Manipulate JSON-like data with NumPy-like idioms.
